quote: It is a great consolation for me to remember that the Lord, to whom I had drawn near in humble and child-like faith, has suffered and died for me, and that He will look on me in love and compassion.
quote_letters: IT IS A GREAT CONSOLATION FOR ME TO REMEMBER THAT THE LORD TO WHOM I HAD DRAWN NEAR IN HUMBLE AND CHILD-LIKE FAITH HAS SUFFERED AND DIED FOR ME AND THAT HE WILL LOOK ON ME IN LOVE AND COMPASSION
